name: One Man Squad
description: Inspired by the tradition of herbal drinks, it is an alcoholic blend, with the flavours of african hers and fruits, combined to give a refreshing bitter-sweet taste

name: Orijin
description: Inspired by the tradition of herbal drinks, it is an alcoholic blend, with the flavours of african hers and fruits, combined to give a refreshing bitter-sweet taste
